com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api

Interface JCGLDepthBuffersType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JCGLDepthClampingType

    public interface JCGLDepthBuffersType
extends JCGLDepthClampingType
    The interface to OpenGL depth buffers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void depthBufferClear(float depth)
      Clear the depth buffer with the specified value depth.
      int depthBufferGetBits() 
      void depthBufferTestDisable()
      Disable depth testing.

      Enable depth testing with the given function.

      Disable writing to the depth buffer.
      void depthBufferWriteEnable()

      boolean depthBufferWriteIsEnabled() 

      • Methods inherited from interface com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api.JCGLDepthClampingType

        depthClampingDisable, depthClampingEnable, depthClampingIsEnabled

    • Method Detail

      • depthBufferClear

        void depthBufferClear(float depth)
               throws JCGLException,
                      JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer

        Clear the depth buffer with the specified value depth.

        Clearing will have no effect if writing to the depth buffer is disabled.

        Parameters:
        depth - The depth value
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
        JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer - If no depth buffer is available
        See Also:
        depthBufferWriteIsEnabled(), depthBufferWriteEnable(), depthBufferWriteDisable()

      • depthBufferGetBits

        int depthBufferGetBits()
                throws JCGLException
        Returns:
        The number of bits available in the depth buffer for the current framebuffer configuration.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • depthBufferTestDisable

        void depthBufferTestDisable()
                     throws JCGLException,
                            JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer
        Disable depth testing.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
        JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer - If no depth buffer is available

      • depthBufferTestEnable

        void depthBufferTestEnable(JCGLDepthFunction function)
                    throws JCGLException,
                           JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer
        Enable depth testing with the given function. The OpenGL default for function is LESS_THAN.
        Parameters:
        function - The depth function
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
        JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer - If no depth buffer is available

      • depthBufferTestIsEnabled

        boolean depthBufferTestIsEnabled()
                          throws JCGLException,
                                 JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer
        Returns:
        true iff depth testing is enabled.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
        JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer - If no depth buffer is available

      • depthBufferWriteDisable

        void depthBufferWriteDisable()
                      throws JCGLException,
                             JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer
        Disable writing to the depth buffer.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
        JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer - If no depth buffer is available

      • depthBufferWriteEnable

        void depthBufferWriteEnable()
                     throws JCGLException,
                            JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer
        Enable writing to the depth buffer.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
        JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer - If no depth buffer is available

      • depthBufferWriteIsEnabled

        boolean depthBufferWriteIsEnabled()
                           throws JCGLException,
                                  JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer
        Returns:
        true iff depth writing is enabled.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
        JCGLExceptionNoDepthBuffer - If no depth buffer is available
